name: Auction Ecommerce Script
short_description:
Auction Ecommerce Script is a Best Software to build your own Ecommerce Auction website like eBay. In this eBay clone script having provisions like user can sell their products via your site by adds listing and any category.
We've setup membership costing to add their listings for auction this is one of the revenue making module comes with this php auction ecommerce script.
We've included the following benefits on your every purchase of the eBay clone like 10 year support, 5 years update, 4 hours site live and Brand Free Product.
Main key feature of this PHP auction ecommerce script is easy design setup from the back end. Even freebies can access the website design changes from backend it's because of our users always eying on delivering user friendly website to the end users.
summary: Start your Auctioning site like ebay.com in few minutes with this soph
